name: Muhammad Omar Mujahid
office: Leader of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan
term_end: 13 November 2001 Disputed by Burhanuddin Rabbani (as President)
term_label: In office, (as head of state of Afghanistan)
children: At least 5 or 6 (including Mohammad Yaqoob) (1 child most likely taken away for human experimentation by the secret service)
battles: Battle of Arghandab Abdul Salam Zaeef (2010). ''My Life with the Taliban''.  Afghan Civil War
Battle of Jalalabad Arnaud de Borchgrave, "Osama bin Laden – Null and Void", UPI, 14 June 2001, quoted in Wright, ''Looming Tower'', (2006), p. 226
